content:
On my iPhone, scanning of SHC with the camera says QR Code Detected but No usable data found.

Which iPhone apps will show just the plain shc:... string?
I don't have access to an iPhone, but have you tried a dedicated QR scanner app? (I've used a dozen on Android without issues.)
Yes, the iOS camera app doesn't know anything about shc:/..., so that's what it will say.

@Paul Denning here's a QR with a link to an iOS Shortcut to help you scan a Health Card QR ;-)

image.png

(Or, to be less cute, here's a direct link to the iOS Shortcut.)
Thx. I wasn't familiar with iOS shortcuts, but it worked well
